original_text: These are the people of Israel as listed by their fathers' houses. All those listed in the camps by their companies were 603,550.
korean_text: 이상은 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 조상의 가문을 따라 계수된 자니 모든 진영의 군인 곧 계수된 자의 총계는 육십만 삼천오백오십 명이며

sentences.original_text: These are the people of Israel
as listed by their fathers' houses.
All those listed in the camps

sentences.korean_translation: 그 부대대로 계수하니 육십삼천 오백오십 명이었다.
